dct_title_s: Land grant map of Broadway in Somers Point, New Jersey
dct_description_sm: Based on the shoreline and the roadway alignments, this map depicts properties along Broadway in Somers Point. Brick Kiln Creek is on the extreme left, then Broadway; the "vertical" roadway is Goll Avenue ; the next "horizontal" road is Shore Road / Rt 585; and at the far right is Harbor Lane.
Map is very old and in poor condition, information missing and difficult to interpret exact location
Title has been created from what little information is available, exact title not given
